member.name: T:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy
member.summary: Represents an MSBuild task for performing db deploy's inside of msbuild

member.name: F:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.Logger
member.summary: Creates the default logger

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.ChangeLog
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the change log table. Defaults to changelog

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.ConfigurationService
member.summary: Gets or sets the deployment service to use. This is injected by unity and should not be set.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets a connection string to be used by the system. There is no default for this value.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.DatabaseType
member.summary: Gets or sets the database type to be used. mssql, mysql, and ora

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.DeploymentService
member.summary: Gets or sets the deployment service to use. This is injected by unity and should not be set.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.FileNamePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern to use for parsing the name of the script file

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.LastChangeToApply
member.summary: Gets or sets the last change to apply to the database. The default is int.MaxValue. The max is int.MaxValue.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the output file where the generated script will be placed. The default is DbDeploy.sql in the same directory where dbdeploy is run.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.Recursive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the script search should be recursive. If true, all scripts matching the search criteria below the RootDirectory will be included in the script run.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.RootDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the root directory where dbdeploy begins its search for scripts

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.Schema
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema to use as a prefix for the change log table. Defaults to dbo.

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.SearchPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the search pattern to use for finding script files. The default is "*.sql"

member.name: P:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.UndoFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the undo file that will be used for this run. The default is DbDeployUndo.sql in the same directory where dbdeploy is run.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.BuildTasks.DbDeploy.Execute
member.summary: Executes the task.
member.returns: A boolean indicating whether or not the execution was successful.

member.name: T:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility
member.summary: Represents a class for assisting with logging statements.
member.remarks: Throughout this class, logging is NOT done as recommended in other classes to avoid potential recursion from calling this static class over and over.

member.name: F:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.MaxDepth
member.summary: Limits the maximum logging depth. Basically, if you're deeper than this, you're probably recursing, so don't go any deeper

member.name: F:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.Log
member.summary: Creates the default logger

member.name: F:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.currentDepth
member.summary: A counter for preventing recursive depths in logging.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.GetContext(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets the context using a method base and the args passed to it. Ideal for PostSharp
member.returns: a string containing the formatted text for the method

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.GetContext(System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets the context for the current method call and translates it into a debug logging statement.
member.returns: A string containing the context string.
member.exception: Thrown when the number of parameters passed does not match the number of parameters defined on the method.
member.remarks: The parameters of the call are not available to reflection, so they must be passed in. If the number of parameters passed to GetContext doesn't match the number expected, and exception is thrown.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.GetObjectValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the value for an object.
member.param: The value to get a string for.
member.returns: A string representation of the object.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.GetResult
member.summary: Gets the result string message for result calls.
member.returns: A string containing the method get result string and the result value.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.GetResult(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the result string message for result calls.
member.param: The result value to be added to the string.
member.returns: A string containing the method get result string and the result value.

member.name: M:DatabaseDeploy.Core.Utilities.LogUtility.GetResult(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the result string message for result calls.
member.param: The current method to get a result for.
The result value to be added to the string.
member.returns: A string containing the method get result string and the result value.

The values that have been passed for logging.
member.returns: A string containing the built up logging statement.

member.summary: Gets the current method for the calls to logutility.
